abstract: Ohio Athletic Commission official announces that boxer Hamzah Ajahmi, who collapsed during his debut in the ring, died in Youngstown hospital.
lead_paragraph: An Ohio boxing official said a Michigan-based fighter had died, days after he collapsed and lost consciousness during his professional debut.

headline.main: Fighter Dies After His First Pro Bout
headline.print_headline: Fighter Dies After His First Pro Bout

snippet: An Ohio boxing official said a Michigan-based fighter had died, days after he collapsed and lost consciousness during his professional debut.
